knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
cats = data.frame(coat = c("calico", "black", "tabby"),
                  weight = c(2.1, 5.0, 3.2),
                  like_string = c(1,0,1))
cats
```


```{r}
dir.create("data")
write.csv(x=cats, file="data/feline-data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
cats = read.csv(file="data/feline-data.csv")
print(cats)
```
